title: S8E01 – "Woeful Wilderness" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark – the debut of our latest and greatest eighth season, with 24 brand new episodes to scare your socks off – we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Michael Whitehouse, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about haunted hermits, malevolent children, eerie ruins, and sinister sirens.

                                
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
